name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2-inch screen, 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage, and a 4000mAh battery.

name: BT Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Gaming PC
description: Intel i7 CPU, NVIDIA RTX 3080 GPU, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, liquid cooling, RGB lighting, 144Hz monitor, mechanical keyboard, wireless gaming mouse.

name: Air Conditioner
description: Model 1.5 Ton 5 Star Split AC (185CYA): It offers a cooling capacity of 5050 W, utilizes a high EER rotary compressor, and includes features like swing mode operation.

name: All in One PC
description: Compact, powerful processor, large display, ample storage, integrated webcam, wireless connectivity, ergonomic keyboard and mouse, sleek design.

name: Wireless
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek Silver color.

name: Iphone
description: Apple iPhone: 6.1-inch display, Face ID, three cameras, A14 Bionic chip, 5G connectivity, iOS 14.

name: Convertable Laptop
description: Convertible laptop with Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, 13.3' touchscreen display, Windows 10 OS.

name: Dishwasher
description: Dishwasher with Intensive Kadhai Programme for greasy utensils, 52dB Noise Level, 6 Wash Programmes, and quick drying options. Save water (10L/cycle), get clean, dry dishes in 59 minutes.

name: Refrigerator
description: Experience more space with Spacemax Technology, enjoy fresh food with All-around Cooling, and benefit from a DIT Compressor for energy efficiency - all supported by a seamless and sleek design.

name: Washing Machine
description: Energy-efficient 7 kg front load washer with Hygiene Steam/direct-drive tech for superior wash quality. 5-star energy rating, low energy and water consumption- ideal for 3-4 member households.
